name: Lundum Dare 39 - Hive Attack!
description:
Second attempt to make game for LDJam COMPO!

SYNOPSIS

Evil HIVE is attacking your base! Survive until reinforcements would arrive! 10 minutes! HIVE will gather its strength! There will be lack of ammo on last minutes! Cheer up, and fight!

TOOLS
  • UNTIY 5.6.0f3
  • PHOTOSHOP
  • bfxr.net - sound
